posts.title: The Eiger Sanction
posts.excerpt: Quote:Dr. Jonathan Hemlock (Clint Eastwood) is an art history professor and collector who finances his hobby by performing the odd sanction (assassination) for an obscure government bureau. posts._title: Dario Argento – Il cartaio AKA The Card Player (2004)
posts.title: Il cartaio
posts.excerpt: Quote: A Rome policewoman teams up with a British Interpool agent to find a crafty serial killer whom plays a taunting game of cat-and-mouse with the police by abducting and killing young women and showing it over an Internet web cam.

posts._title: Leo Birinsky & Paul Leni – Das Wachsfigurenkabinett AKA Waxworks (1924)
posts.title: Das Wachsfigurenkabinett
posts.excerpt: A wax museum hires a writer to give the sculptures stories. The writer imagines himself and the museum owner’s daughter in the stories.

posts.title: Two Deaths

posts._title: Vincent McEveety – The Strongest Man in the World (1975)
posts.title: The Strongest Man in the World
posts.excerpt: A school laboratory accident mixes one student’s vitamin cereal mix with Dexter Riley’s chemical experiment. When the kids decide to dispose of the mess to their neighbor’s cow, they learn that the cereal gave the cow the super-strength to give a massively vast supply of milk. When they try it out on themselves, they discover …

posts.title: Nainsukh
posts.excerpt: Nainsukh is a 2010 film directed by Amit Dutta based on the life and works of Nainsukh, an 18th-century Indian miniature painter.The film contains meticulous recreations of Nainsukh’s paintings through compositions set amidst the ruins and environs of Jasrota palace. where the artist was retained. posts.title: A Poem Is a Naked Person
posts.excerpt: Quote:“Les Blank made A Poem Is A Naked Person during 1972-74, while living at the Russell/Shelter records recording studio compound on Grand Lake Of The Cherokees in NE Oklahoma. While the film has had few public showings as, apparantly, Mr. Russell is not keen on sharing it with his public.

posts.title: Körhinta
posts.excerpt: In a rural scenery in the throes of difficult changes lives a humble but promising young farmer girl called Mari Pataki. Her father forbids her from seeing the man she loves. posts._title: Ventura Pons – Animals ferits AKA Wounded Animals (2006)
posts.title: Animals ferits
posts.excerpt: Three couples deal with the sticky issue of infidelity in this comedy-drama from Spanish filmmaker Ventura Pons. Silvio (Jose Coronado) is a well-to-do business executive who is seemingly happily married to Marcia (Cecilia Rossetto). However, Silvio is convinced Marcia is cheating on him, and frequently spies on her — ironically enough, he usually does so …
